key.name: hide-panel-icon
key.description: When enabled, the icon is hidden from the top panel. The extension can still be accessed via keyboard shortcuts.

key.name: remember-last-tab
key.description: When enabled, the menu will re-open to the last viewed tab instead of resetting to the default 'Recently Used' tab.

key.name: hidden-icon-position-mode
key.summary: Positioning mode when panel icon is hidden
key.description: Determines where the menu appears when opened via shortcut while the panel icon is hidden. Can be 'cursor', 'center', or 'window'.

key.name: clipboard-history-max-items
key.summary: Maximum number of items in clipboard history
key.description: The maximum number of unpinned items to store in the clipboard history.

key.name: update-recency-on-copy
key.summary: Move item to top on copy
key.description: When an item is copied from the clipboard history, move it to the top of the list.

key.name: unpin-on-paste
key.description: When a pinned item is pasted, automatically unpin it and move it to the top of the history. If disabled, pinned items will remain pinned after pasting.

key.name: emoji-recents-max-items
key.description: The maximum number of recently used emojis to store and display in the Emoji 'Recents' tab.

key.name: kaomoji-recents-max-items
key.description: The maximum number of recently used kaomojis to store and display in the Kaomoji 'Recents' tab.

key.name: symbols-recents-max-items
key.description: The maximum number of recently used symbols to store and display in the Symbols 'Recents' tab.

key.name: gif-recents-max-items
key.description: The maximum number of recently used GIFs to store and display in the GIF 'Recents' tab.

key.name: enable-auto-paste
key.description: When enabled, selected items will be automatically pasted instead of just copied to clipboard.

key.name: auto-paste-emoji
key.description: Automatically paste emojis when selected (requires master toggle).

key.name: auto-paste-gif
key.description: Automatically paste GIFs when selected (requires master toggle).

key.name: auto-paste-kaomoji
key.description: Automatically paste kaomojis when selected (requires master toggle).

key.name: auto-paste-symbols
key.description: Automatically paste symbols when selected (requires master toggle).

key.name: auto-paste-clipboard
key.description: Automatically paste items from clipboard history when selected (requires master toggle).

key.name: enable-custom-skin-tones
key.description: Master switch to enable or disable custom skin tone configuration. If false, skinnable emojis will render in their neutral (yellow) form. If true, the 'Custom Skin Tone Primary' and 'Custom Skin Tone Secondary' settings will be used.

key.name: custom-skin-tone-primary
key.description: Sets the skin tone for single-person emojis, or the first person in a multi-person emoji, when 'Enable Custom Skin Tones' is active. Stores the Unicode skin tone modifier character.

key.name: custom-skin-tone-secondary
key.description: Sets the skin tone for the second person in a multi-person emoji, when 'Enable Custom Skin Tones' is active. Stores the Unicode skin tone modifier character.

key.name: gif-provider
key.description: Can be 'none', 'tenor', or 'imgur'.

key.name: gif-tenor-api-key
key.summary: User's API key for the Tenor GIF service
key.description: Required when using Tenor as the GIF provider.

key.name: gif-imgur-client-id
key.summary: User's Client ID for the Imgur service
key.description: Required when using Imgur as the GIF provider.

key.name: gif-cache-limit-mb
key.description: The maximum size for the GIF preview cache in megabytes. Set to 0 for unlimited cache size.

key.name: clear-recents-trigger
key.summary: Trigger to clear recent items data
key.description: Internal use only. Setting this to 'emoji', 'gif', 'kaomoji', 'symbols', or 'all' will trigger the extension to clear the corresponding cached recent items. It will be reset to empty after the action is performed.
